about_the_game:
Do you want to complete Succubus Hotel getting all short paths, unlocking all adult scenes, and having all of them in HD resolution to create your wallpapers?

This DLC contains a walkthrough with all the detailed information you need to complete the whole game. Also, it contains all adult scenes of Succubus Hotel WITHOUT backgrounds and sketches, size 1920x1080. In fact, by buying this DLC, you'll get:

  • A Walkthrough Document ;
  • 15 Adult Scenes (43 images);
  • 17 Sketches

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Succubus Hotel\Adult Art Pack + Walkthrough

content_descriptors.notes: Succubus Hotel - Adult Art Pack + Walkthrough contains strong language, partial and full nudity, explicit sexual relations.
